import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Meal from '../Projects/Meal'; import Hearsay from '../Projects/Hearsay'; import picnic from '../images/picnic.png' import bullhorn from '../images/bullhorn.png' import food from '../images/vegetable.png' import Parkfinder from '../Projects/Parkfinder'; import './Accordion.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faChevronDown, faChevronUp } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { faReact, faNodeJs, faJs, faHtml5, faCss3, faGitAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core'; const LightTooltip = withStyles((theme) => ({ tooltip: { border: '1px solid black', backgroundColor: theme.palette.common.white, color: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87)', boxShadow: theme.shadows[1], fontSize: 11, margin: 0, fontWeight: 900, }, }))(Tooltip); export default function Accordion() { const [oneIsOpen, setOneIsOpen] = useState(false); const [twoIsOpen, setTwoIsOpen] = useState(false); const [threeIsOpen, setThreeIsOpen] = useState(false); const toggleOne = () => setOneIsOpen(!oneIsOpen) const toggleTwo = () => setTwoIsOpen(!twoIsOpen) const toggleThree = () => setThreeIsOpen(!threeIsOpen) return (
find your park

full stack app for searching through california parks

{oneIsOpen &&
}
hearsay

full stack app for reviewing encounters with law enforcement

{twoIsOpen &&
}
meal generator

single page app for meal planning based on diet restrictions

{threeIsOpen &&
}
) }
